lexUnit.name: frugal.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: sparing or economical as regards money or food.

sentence.text: Both were frugal in their use of energy and time .

` SURE of foot , hard of hide , strong in constitution , frugal in diet , a first-rate weight carrier , indifferent to heat and cold , he combines the best of the most homely characteristics of both the noble houses from which he is descended . "
Laboulbeniales are rather frugal with their spores .
Being a rather mean and frugal man , he employed a local stonemason who was well versed in the designs of the great architects of the day such as James Gibbs .
If parsimony stems from waste , so generosity can flow from a frugal husbandman .
Kendalians were described , a population of 8,000 as ` a frugal , industrious people , and many of them have risen to a considerable degree of opulence by their assiduous attention to business . "
She insists she lives a frugal life .
But clearly the Queen 's well-known frugal habits have rubbed off on staff .
She was said to be a good cook , a frugal manager , an enthusiastic gardener .
He led a remarkably frugal existence but his idiosyncrasies , which embraced the recycling of cigar butts , were from preference rather than parsimony .
It was a simple frugal life .
Myth has it that the accumulation was financed by frugal Japanese workers .
But this caution , this frugal husbanding of manpower , was not founded purely on cold reasoning .
Japan has few energy resources of its own and it has learnt to be frugal : energy prices are approximately twice those in Britain .
` She was rather frugal , " admitted the rector .
Their Christmas had been too frugal , he decided .
His followers were frugal .
She liked to be frugal : to have money and carefully dole it out .
He was a hardworking , frugal and thrifty man who was saving to buy a small cottage from his employer .
She is also known for being frugal and will often only serve visiting supporters after running a used teabag three or four times through a mangle .
I 'm a bit too frugal to splash out masses of cash on designer clothes .
